blogPost.excerpt: Best10 offers unrivalled daily support at your fingertips and in the comfort of your own home. Receive daily checkins with your certified coach, a 100% personalised workout and eating plan, complete with shopping lists and recipes.
blogPost.body: Best10 offers unrivalled daily support at your fingertips and in the comfort of your own home. Receive daily checkins with your certified coach, a 100% personalised workout and eating plan, complete with shopping lists and recipes.
blogPost.title: Best10 - 100% personalised workouts, eating plan & a certified coach.
blogPost.author: Mike Metelerkamp

localize.description: Best10为您提供无与伦比的日常支持，让您在家中就能享受到舒适的生活。每天都会收到您的认证教练的检查，100%个性化的锻炼和饮食计划，以及完整的购物清单和食谱。
localize.tagline: 100%个性化的锻炼，饮食计划和认证教练。

localize.description: Best10爲您提供無與倫比的日常支持，讓您在家中就能享受到舒適的生活。每天都會收到您的認證教練的檢查，100%個性化的鍛鍊和飲食計劃，以及完整的購物清單和食譜。
localize.tagline: 100%個性化的鍛鍊，飲食計劃和認證教練。

previous.excerpt: Guardians is a personal safety app designed to be used with your close family & trusted friends. It starts with location sharing but it’s lot more than that.
previous.title: Guardians - A safety app for women

localize.description: Guardians是一款专为你的亲密家人和值得信赖的朋友而设计的个人安全应用。它从位置共享开始，但它的功能远不止于此。
Guardians是一款專爲你的親密家人和值得信賴的朋友而設計的個人安全應用。它從位置共享開始，但它的功能遠不止於此。

next.excerpt: The Awesome lists on GitHub are great, but it's hard to know which projects are actively maintained and sift through them all easily. I built this tool to help me visualize and query all of the cool resources people put together.
next.title: Awesome Viewer - Visualize all of Github's awesome lists

localize.description: GitHub上的Awesome列表很不错，但很难知道哪些项目是积极维护的，也很难轻松地筛选出所有项目。我建立了这个工具来帮助我可视化和查询所有人们放在一起的酷炫资源。
localize.tagline: 可视化Github的所有精彩列表。

localize.description: GitHub上的Awesome列表很不錯，但很難知道哪些項目是積極維護的，也很難輕鬆地篩選出所有項目。我建立了這個工具來幫助我可視化和查詢所有人們放在一起的酷炫資源。
localize.tagline: 可視化Github的所有精彩列表。
